attributes.action: Increase the penalty for using your mobile phone while driving to automatic ban from driving for at least 1 year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current penalty of a fine is not a deterrent.People  using mobiles while driving are a threat to the lives of all other road users.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
